name: Selma Kelly
comment: This is very impressive to work with this laptop. All the configuration is a massive change compared to previous one. Cooling technology is upgraded as there is no heating issue. As a gamer i always happy to use the laptop üòç.

name: Vicki Wright
comment: If you prefer macOS or need great tech support,but this laptop is a safe bet; the 13-inch models usually offer the best combination of size, weight, and speed. They‚Äôre great for writers, office workers, commuters, and college students.

name: Delacruz Hicks
comment: Like Apple‚Äôs other laptops, the Air of this laptop has only a small number of homogenous ports (in this case, two Thunderbolt 3/USB-C ports that may require the use of hubs or new cables). it's good üëçüèª

name: Mcintosh Hendricks
comment: But the Air‚Äôs light weight, solid construction, and industry-leading support make it a great laptop, feels like you own an macBook or other devices..

name: Winifred Davidson
comment: I got this device very impressive to work with. But my cooling system isn't working after some days don't know if anyone else facing this issue.

name: Liz Alston
comment: It's not in my category. This laptop should have some other features as the technology upgrading everyday. I belive they can improve to the next version of the laptop.

name: Rosemarie Doyle
comment: Exactly not a good item for me. I used to with macBook but i came to the laptop and very disappointing fro me it's  slow and heating issue is suffering me.
